name: feDisplacementMap
desc: This filter primitive uses the pixels values from the image from in2 to spatially displace the image from in.

props.name: scale
props.desc:
Displacement scale factor. The amount is expressed in the coordinate system established by attribute primitiveUnits on the filter element.

When the value of this attribute is 0, this operation has no effect on the source image.

The lacuna value is 0.

props.name: xChannelSelector
props.desc: Indicates which channel from in2 to use to displace the pixels in in along the x-axis. The lacuna value is A.

props.name: yChannelSelector
props.desc: Indicates which channel from in2 to use to displace the pixels in in along the y-axis. The lacuna value is A.
